attributes.action: Give Arsène Wenger a knighthood for his services to football and British Sport
attributes.background: Arsène Wenger has been around influencing sport in the UK for the past 15 years and as a result he should be rewarded like Sir Alex Ferguson. He deserves to be recognised for his services to sport and the wider community in and around football in London and the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
